name: 3dmaxdisp
author: AFNI Developers
description: Reads in a 3D dataset and a DICOM-based affine matrix to output the average and maximum displacement applied to the edge voxels of the 3D dataset's automask.

inputs.description: Input dataset file used to form the mask over which displacements will be computed.
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: 3x4 affine transformation matrix file applied to the coordinates of the voxels in the dataset mask.
inputs.name: Transformation Matrix File

output-files.description: Results showing average and maximum displacements.
output-files.name: Displacement Output
